item.title: Donald add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Donald add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "Ain't it just like the night to play tricks when you're tryin' to be so quiet?" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Donald add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "Everywhere I go I'm asked if I think the university stifles writers. My opinion is that they don't stifle enough of them. There's many a best-seller that could have been prevented by a good teacher." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Donald add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "It’s a pity if someone… has to console himself for the wreck of his days with the notion that somehow his voice, his work embodies the deepest, most obscure, freshest, rawest oyster of reality in the unfathomable refrigerator of the heart’s ocean, but I am such a one, and there you have it." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Donald add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "The Harmonica is the world’s best-selling musical instrument. You’re welcome." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Donald add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings
